SA20n1345:2: na sanna cāsanna tathā na cānyathā na jāyate vyeti na cāvahīyate |
SA20n1345:3: na vardhate nāpi viśudhyate punarviśudhyate tatparamārthalakṣaṇam ||1 ||
SA20n1345:4: na cātmadṛṣṭiḥ svayamātmalakṣaṇā na cāpi duḥsaṃsthitatā vilakṣaṇā |
SA20n1345:5: dvayānna cānyad bhrama eṣata[tū]ditastataśca mokṣo bhramamātrasaṃkṣayaḥ ||2 ||
SA20n1345:6: kathaṃ jano vibhramamātramāśritaḥ paraiti duḥkhaprakṛtiṃ na saṃtatām |
SA20n1345:7: avedako vedaka eva duḥkhito na duḥkhito dharmamayo na tanmayaḥ ||3 ||
SA20n1345:10: ta cāntaraṃ kiṃcana vidyate 'nayoḥ sadarthavṛttyā śamajanmanoriha |
SA20n1345:11: tathāpi janmakṣayato vidhīyate śamasya lābhaḥ śubhakarmakāriṇām ||5 ||
SA20n1345:12: saṃbhṛtya saṃbhāramanantapāraṃ jñānasya puṇyasya ca bodhisattvaḥ |
SA20n1345:14: arthānsa vijñāya ca jalpamātrān saṃtiṣṭhate tannibhacittamātre |
